name: @finanzritter/nativescript-pdf-view
description: A basic PDF viewer plugin for NativeScript, to display PDF documents on iOS and Android.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.android.device: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove @finanzritter/nativescript-pdf-view && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.setup: npm ci && cd ../demo && npm ci && cd ../src && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../src
